name: PayPal Checkout
description: A seamless and secure payment solution that allows businesses to accept payments via PayPal, credit cards, and digital wallets.

name: PayPal Business Account
description: A business-focused PayPal account that enables merchants to send invoices, accept payments, and manage transactions easily.

name: PayPal Working Capital
description: A financing solution that provides cash advances to businesses based on their PayPal sales, with flexible repayment options.

name: PayPal Zettle POS
description: A point-of-sale (POS) system that includes a card reader and software to help businesses accept in-person payments effortlessly.

name: PayPal Buy Now, Pay Later
description: A flexible payment option that allows customers to split their purchase into interest-free installments, increasing sales conversions.
